name: athena

in Greek mythology (= ancient stories), the goddess (= female god) of wisdom who was believed to protect the city of Athens: Atop the Acropolis, the temple of the goddess Athena looms over the city. Compare
Minerva
More examplesFewer examplesThe Parthenon was the sanctuary of the goddess Athena.Legend has it that Athena, goddess of wisdom, gave the olive tree to the Greek people. Athena's wisdom and guidance enabled Odysseus to fulfill his destiny.There stood an ivory-and-gold-covered wooden statue of Athena said to be 12 metres high. A festival was held annually at Athens in honour of Athene, the patron goddess of the city.
